scripts.start: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e localhost -o report/index.json scenarios/signup-and-placement.yml
scripts.load-test:test-connectivity:local: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e localhost -o report/index.json scenarios/test-connectivity.yml
scripts.load-test:test-connectivity:review-app: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e review-app -o report/index.json scenarios/test-connectivity.yml
